name: Wos
description: Wos is a rapper from Argentina. He is known for his songs 'Canguro' and 'Andromeda'. He is also recognized for his collaborations with other artists such as Trueno, Duki, and Paulo Londra.

name: Trueno
description: Trueno is a rapper from Argentina. He is known for his songs 'Mamichula' and 'Atrevido'. He is also recognized for his collaborations with other artists such as Wos, Duki, and Nicki Nicole.

name: Imagine Dragons
description: Imagine Dragons is an American rock band from Las Vegas, Nevada. They are known for their songs 'Radioactive' and 'Believer'. They are also recognized for their collaborations with other artists such as Kendrick Lamar, Lil Wayne, and Kygo.

name: Kendrick Lamar
description: Kendrick Lamar is an American rapper from Compton, California. He is known for his songs 'Humble' and 'DNA'. He is also recognized for his collaborations with other artists such as SZA, Travis Scott, and Rihanna.

name: Kid Cudi
description: Kid Cudi is an American rapper from Cleveland, Ohio. He is known for his songs 'Day 'n' Nite' and 'Pursuit of Happiness'. He is also recognized for his collaborations with other artists such as Kanye West, Travis Scott, and A$AP Rocky.

name: Kris Baha
description: Kris Baha is an Australian DJ and producer. He is known for his songs 'Lockdown' and 'Living Nothingness'. He is also recognized for his collaborations with other artists such as The Hacker, Alessandro Adriani, and Black Merlin.

name: BBNO$
description: BBNO$ is a Canadian rapper from Vancouver, British Columbia. He is known for his songs 'Lalala' and 'Shining On My Ex'. He is also recognized for his collaborations with other artists such as Yung Gravy, Y2K, and Lil Mayo.

name: Bad Bunny
description: Bad Bunny is a Puerto Rican rapper and singer. He is known for his songs 'Callaita' and 'Yo Perreo Sola'. He is also recognized for his collaborations with other artists such as J Balvin, Drake, and Cardi B.
